Now let me fix the other module pom.xml files. Let me create a script to do this more efficiently:

input.command:
cd /tmp/workdir/preprocess_strands_20260128/rulewerk && cat > /tmp/clean_pom.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Script to remove incorrectly added Java 17 properties and compiler plugin from module pom.xml files

for module in rulewerk-rdf rulewerk-owlapi rulewerk-graal rulewerk-commands rulewerk-examples rulewerk-client rulewerk-integrationtests coverage; do
    pomfile="/tmp/workdir/preprocess_strands_20260128/rulewerk/$module/pom.xml"
    
    if [ -f "$pomfile" ]; then
        echo "Processing $module..."
        
        # Create a backup
        cp "$pomfile" "$pomfile.bak"
        
        # Remove the compiler properties from properties tag
        sed -i 's/<maven\.compiler\.source>17<\/maven\.compiler\.source><maven\.compiler\.target>17<\/maven\.compiler\.target><maven\.compiler\.release>17<\/maven\.compiler\.release>//g' "$pomfile"
        
        # Remove standalone compiler plugin configuration blocks that were added
        # This is a bit more complex - we'll use perl for multiline replacements
        perl -i -0pe 's/<plugin>\s*<groupId>org\.apache\.maven\.plugins<\/groupId>\s*<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin<\/artifactId>\s*<configuration>\s*<source>17<\/source>\s*<target>17<\/target>\s*<release>17<\/release>\s*<\/configuration>\s*<\/plugin>//gs' "$pomfile"
        
        # Also clean up properties/build tags that were added to the end
        perl -i -0pe 's/<properties><maven\.compiler\.source>17<\/maven\.compiler\.source><maven\.compiler\.target>17<\/maven\.compiler\.target><maven\.compiler\.release>17<\/maven\.compiler\.release><\/properties>//gs' "$pomfile"
        perl -i -0pe 's/<build>\s*<plugins>\s*<plugin>\s*<groupId>org\.apache\.maven\.plugins<\/groupId>\s*<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin<\/artifactId>\s*<configuration>\s*<source>17<\/source>\s*<target>17<\/target>\s*<release>17<\/release>\s*<\/configuration>\s*<\/plugin>\s*<\/plugins>\s*<\/build>//gs' "$pomfile"
        
        echo "Done with $module"
    fi
done
EOF
chmod +x /tmp/clean_pom.sh
/tmp/clean_pom.sh
